tweet: In this week's e-newsletter, I recap the latest, including my work to fight #ClimateChange, oppose the #Trump administration's heavy-handed actions at the border, restore our democracy in the new Congress, and encourage Coloradans to #GetCovered. https://bit.ly/2FQlHkr

The National Climate Assessment warns that #ClimateChange will wreak havoc on Colorado's water supply, affecting everything from agriculture to winter sports to our local breweries. Whether #Trump believes it or not, the findings are clear: we must #ActOnClimate. pic.twitter.com/6wcMmmQsVL

#Trump's attempt to bury the National Climate Assessment can't hide the facts: The #climate crisis is also a public health crisis that could cost us precious lives and billions of dollars. Keep spreading the word -- our future depends on it. pic.twitter.com/CF2WGdfgqa

Colorado's outdoor economy could be decimated by #ClimateChange, according to the National Climate Assessment. I introduced a bipartisan resolution calling for action on climate change because we have to protect outdoor recreation and all of its benefits.  https://bit.ly/2E0knK2  pic.twitter.com/JAzNyvi9Tf

Though #Trump tried to bury the National Climate Assessment, we will keep pushing to highlight the report's dire warnings about the effects of #ClimateChange. They are happening now and harming us all, especially the most vulnerable -- as this graphic from the report makes clear. pic.twitter.com/LpHippC6Se

A week ago, the National Climate Assessment was released, detailing the dramatic and damaging effects of #ClimateChange now and in the future. We can't let this groundbreaking report fade into the news cycle; its alarming findings are too critical to ignore. #ClimateFriday

This hack makes last year's massive #Equifax data breach look like child's play. Apparently none of us can count on the security of our private information, and it's downright scary. As Co-Chair of the Privacy Caucus, I'll keep working to get answers and prevent future breaches. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1068518023449858048 …

This change attacks core pillars of the #ACA that help Americans with pre-existing conditions secure health insurance. If we don't stop this sabotage, we could return to the dark days when many were denied coverage. This is not empowering consumers. https://wapo.st/2RivWip

We must fight to secure a vote in the House to restore #NetNeutrality. A free and open internet helps provide greater knowledge, freedom of speech and economic opportunity for Coloradans and all Americans. We can't give up until these protections are reinstated. pic.twitter.com/8QRJnqqM1J

The National Climate Assessment warns that #ClimateChange will wreak havoc on Colorado's water supply, affecting everything from agriculture to winter sports to our local breweries. Whether #Trump believes it or not, the findings are clear: we must #ActOnClimate. pic.twitter.com/caLrPwQ08Y

.@BetsyDeVosED is wrong to propose changes to #TitleIX that make it harder for sexual assault survivors to come forward. My colleagues and I challenged this irresponsible move in a letter sent to her today. We can't deny victims the chance to seek justice. pic.twitter.com/hKI1owotpr

The 115th Congress is drawing to a close, and time's running out to overturn the @FCC's repeal of #NetNeutrality. We need 218 votes on the discharge petition I signed to force a vote on this priority and save the free and open internet. Be sure to spread the word today! pic.twitter.com/UlI9KhR7hK

We need answers about how officials are determining when separation is necessary for the child’s safety. I demanded info from @SecNielsen in an earlier letter and will ensure @HouseDemocrats use our power in the majority to shine a light on these actions.  https://bit.ly/2DQCDok

I implore you to read this article, which highlights the ongoing crisis at our border. Though the Zero Tolerance policy officially ended in June, it appears the #Trump admin. is now using dubious claims to justify a continued effort to separate families.  https://bit.ly/2zxD3gb

#ClimateChange already threatens us all, and #Trump's willful ignorance of its effects could cause even more devastation. I'd say "shame on him," but he is incapable of feeling that emotion. https://twitter.com/QuickTake/status/1067149396582649857 …

We must hold this administration accountable for every action it has taken to advance its reckless, xenophobic agenda that strips people of their humanity and dignity. This can't be who we are as a nation. We must be better than this. 
My statement: https://bit.ly/2FEK2cN

This, coupled with the #Trump administration's recent actions authorizing U.S. troops stationed there to use lethal force if necessary, represents another step in the ongoing militarization of our border that threatens to harm even more innocent people. https://cbsn.ws/2TsfT3j
Federal agents' use of tear gas on innocent civilians, many of them children, at our southern border is a shocking and heavy-handed use of force that we must condemn and heavily scrutinize.

The #Trump Admin. cynically tried to hide the most recent National Climate Assessment, waiting to release it during the holiday weekend. So help spread the serious conclusions from experts across the federal gov't and share their work that Trump is afraid for people to see. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1066067362447847425 …

Words can't express how grateful I am to represent the community where I've spent my life, advocating for friends, family, neighbors and our shared values in Congress. Today, and every day, I'm thankful for this privilege and much more. #HappyThanksgiving to you and yours! pic.twitter.com/fpOKQGIUv5

Thanks to the great people at @proj_angelheart for the tour of their facility and especially for the selfless work they do providing meals that heal to our neighbors in need. These Coloradans, and those who assist them, deserve our full support this holiday season and year-round. https://twitter.com/proj_angelheart/status/1065305603235471361 …

$80 million of your tax dollars was used to implement a cruel, inhumane and completely hapless effort to separate innocent children from their parents. If that doesn't make your blood boil, then nothing will. #DemHouseMajorityIsComing https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1065074101839110144 …

As families and friends gather together for Thanksgiving, please heed this important warning from @CDCgov and keep #romaine lettuce off of the menu. https://twitter.com/CDCgov/status/1064976806401454080 …

#Trans people are facing horrific levels of discrimination, hatred and violence. In this week's e-newsletter, I recap the latest, including my work to achieve big things in the 116th Congress, keep young people tobacco-free, save the #CleanPowerPlan, encourage Coloradans to #GetCovered, and celebrate #WorldDiabetesDay. https://bit.ly/2qPdVwP

I guess now that @EPAAWheeler has sufficiently proven his commitment to environmental degradation, #Trump's willing to give him a permanent gig. He shouldn't get too confident though. Soon, @HouseDemocrats will have the subpoena power needed to hold @EPA fully accountable. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1063511037167714304 …

I joined my colleagues in sending a letter to @EPAAWheeler demanding @EPA scrap its efforts to replace the #CleanPowerPlan with a new rule that would aid the admin's reckless assault on the environment. We must protect our environment and our communities.  https://bit.ly/2zds63j  pic.twitter.com/OEBLwebIoF

It's an honor to be named a Diabetes Champion along with my congressional colleagues. Diabetes doesn't care if you're a Republican or a Democrat, which is why Congress must keep coming together in a bipartisan manner to strengthen advocacy efforts and find a cure. https://twitter.com/TheEndoSociety/status/1063212213828239360 …

I heartily applaud this action by @US_FDA to significantly limit the availability of these products, which are luring in a new generation of tobacco users. Better yet, Congress should also pass my #Tobaccoto21 bill to further safeguard the health of our kids. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1063093188146225155 …

During #OpenEnrollment season, good health and peace of mind are just a click away. Between now and January 15, residents of the Centennial State can shop for quality health plans under the #ACA by visiting  http://connectforhealthco.com . #GetCovered pic.twitter.com/co9BD1D8WY

On #WorldDiabetesDay, we acknowledge not only those living with this condition, but also their loved ones fighting alongside them to help manage it. As Co-Chair of the Diabetes Caucus, I'll continue working to improve life for every person affected by #diabetes the world over. pic.twitter.com/FbScUaXfEP

As Congress reconvenes today, I'm sending my Democratic colleagues a treat that's almost as sweet as our new House majority -- licorice "whips." In the 116th Congress, I aim to do some whipping of my own to help pass bills that strengthen America and push back on #Trump's agenda. pic.twitter.com/hkurkwJeie

Today I’m saying “#ThxBirthControl” for giving women power to plan their families and determine their futures. As the Co-Chair of the @ProChoiceCaucus and the mother of two daughters, I’ll continue fighting to ensure every woman has this fundamental reproductive right. pic.twitter.com/xA3wPXduFn

On #VeteransDay, I’m thanking all the veterans who bravely served our country, including my dad. We must honor them with action by ensuring they and their families have the resources needed to thrive. Today, and every day, we value their service, sacrifice and future success. pic.twitter.com/AionjtGilA

Reminder that #OpenEnrollment is happening between now and January 15! Don’t miss your chance to sign up for quality health coverage under the #AffordableCareAct. Enroll in a plan by December 15 to begin coverage on January 1. Visit  http://connectforhealthco.com  for more info. pic.twitter.com/qAdPwpm1Ee

On the Energy and Commerce Committee, I worked with a diverse group of colleagues to pass landmark legislation that benefits millions, such as #21stCenturyCures. As Democratic Whip, I plan to employ these skills to give our country more big wins. https://bit.ly/2qEEcOe

My track record of drafting and passing landmark legislation, representing key successes for Democrats, makes me the right person for the job. I would be honored to serve Coloradans, Congress and my country in this important leadership role. Read more in my letter: pic.twitter.com/k9lVGbFLaT

As we prepare for a new Congress next year, I've announced my candidacy for Democratic Whip in the House. With a narrow majority and a diverse caucus, we'll need a whip with the experience to build broad coalitions and win votes that help advance our values.

Outrageous. #Trump plows ahead, targeting vulnerable refugees despite widespread voter rejection of his hateful agenda on Tuesday. His xenophobic desperation is unleashing a new level of cruelty, but we'll push back -- in defense of refugees and our values. https://twitter.com/politico/status/1060646366433681408 …

The Trump Administration is working furiously to turn back the clock on women’s rights, with renewed attempts to limit health care coverage for birth control and abortion. The latest effort just posted online. We will fight it.   https://s3.amazonaws.com/public-inspection.federalregister.gov/2018-24504.pdf …

With #Sessions leaving and Whitaker in charge, Congress needs to step up and ensure against Trump attempts to undermine @TheJusticeDept. We must protect the Mueller investigation by passing the Special Counsel Independence and Integrity Act.  https://bit.ly/2Qf5e9t

It was energizing to speak with @DenverNorthHigh students today about my experiences as a member of Congress and my ongoing work to serve our community's interests. Big thanks to these young people, who understand the value of civic engagement, on #ElectionDay and every day. pic.twitter.com/XMXfnMZIqC

#ElectionDay is finally here. I commend the Coloradans who have already voted by mail and remind those who haven’t that they can still do so in-person today until 7 p.m. MT. Voting is one of our most sacred rights and responsibilities, so be sure to make your voice heard. pic.twitter.com/vT1cf7yqot

50 years ago, #ShirleyChisholm became the first African American woman elected to Congress. She bravely took on the good ol' boys and blazed a trail for greater representation. We must continue to use our voices and our votes to advance her legacy. #UnboughtUnbossed pic.twitter.com/vNpjM8dHjR

Thanks to the Asian Chamber of Commerce for asking me to speak at last night’s annual dinner and gala. We discussed my work in Congress to ensure the continued success of small businesses and to push back on harmful #Trump administration immigration policies. pic.twitter.com/4m0NeT7J2E

Nearly 100 colleagues and I wrote to @SecAzar to denounce a reported plan redefining sex in a way that harms #transgender people’s rights. #Trans people need more help, not hate, to overcome obstacles. We must ensure they #WontBeErased by the Trump admin.  https://bit.ly/2SzJnfb  pic.twitter.com/tHQuRt88r2

During #AmericanDiabetesMonth, we must recommit ourselves to improving life for people with #diabetes. One way we can do that is by reining in rising #insulin costs. My report on this issue with @RepTomReed presents a path toward lower insulin prices.  https://cbsloc.al/2OjFuHO

Desperate people fleeing for their lives seek #asylum in the U.S. Our country has legal obligations to provide protection to those who qualify as #refugees. Trump’s dire pronouncements about people streaming over the border under the guise of seeking asylum is mere fearmongering.

Latinas in the U.S. earn 53 cents for every dollar made by a white, non-Hispanic man. On #LatinaEqualPayDay, we reaffirm our pledge to close this unacceptable #paygap. One way we can help achieve this, for Latinas and for all women, is by passing the #PaycheckFairnessAct. pic.twitter.com/yydP4XZHU9

Today marks the start of #OpenEnrollment season, your chance to sign up for affordable health coverage through the #ACA. Coloradans can visit  http://connectforhealthco.com  between now and January 15 to shop for quality plans that can ensure better health and may even save you money. pic.twitter.com/7Z2s6vJE9B

My fellow #Diabetes Caucus Co-Chair, @RepTomReed, and I have released the findings of our bipartisan inquiry into rising costs of #insulin, which is out of reach for too many.
